text: The Pocono 400 is a Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series race held annually at Pocono Raceway, it is one of two races held at the circuit, with the other one being the Gander Outdoors 400 in August. It is the 14th race of the season. == Past winners == Year Date Driver Team Manufacturer Laps Miles 1982 June 6 Bobby Allison DiGuard Motorsports Buick 200 1983 June 12 Bobby Allison DiGuard Motorsports Buick 200 1984 June 10 Cale Yarborough Ranier-Lundy Chevrolet 200 1985 June 9 Bill Elliott Meiling Racing Ford 200 1986 June 8 Tim Richmond Hendrick Motorsports Chevrolet 200 1987 June 14 Tim Richmond Hendrick Motorsports Chevrolet 200 1988 June 19 Geoff Bodine Hendrick Motorsports Chevrolet 200 1989 June 18 Terry Labonte Junior Johnson & Associates Ford 200 1990 June 17 Henry Gant Leo Jackson Racing Oldsmobile 200 1991 June 16 Darrell Waltrip Darwal, Inc.
